name: Lulu
title: the Fae Sorceress
shortBio: The yordle mage Lulu is known for conjuring dreamlike illusions and fanciful creatures as she roams Runeterra with her fairy companion Pix. Lulu shapes reality on a whim, warping the fabric of the world, and what she views as the constraints of this mundane, physical realm. While others might consider her magic at best unnatural, and at worst dangerous, she believes everyone could use a touch of enchantment.

skins.name: Bittersweet Lulu
skins.description: A candy witch living on the outskirts of the Peppermint Pine Barrens, Lulu's saccharine enchantments are known to grant incredible powers to any who desire themâ€¦ but only at great cost to their candy soul.

skins.name: Wicked Lulu
skins.description: In Runeterra, parents warn their children to obey them, lest they be snatched away in the night by wicked Lulu. There she'll turn them into pixies, making them gather flowers throughout the spooky forest for her wicked schemes!

skins.name: Dragon Trainer Lulu

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive during 2018.

skins.description: Dragons, though feared, are still living things and can be befriended under the right circumstances. Lulu enthralled her small friend with whimsical magic... becoming the first ever dragon trainer.

skins.name: Winter Wonder Lulu
skins.description: A kindly sorceress trailed by her poro pal Pix, Lulu's whimsical ice magic amazes and delights Snowdown revelers everywhere. She's also a skilled fighter, firing deadly glacial spikes and transforming foes into harmless snowmen.

skins.name: Star Guardian Lulu
skins.description: The youngest member of Lux's team, Lulu is an odd but gifted Star Guardian. Though her unique relationship with the Starlight is sometimes puzzling, Lulu can be counted on to support her teamâ€”and let them know that the light supports them, too.

skins.name: Cosmic Enchantress Lulu

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive during 2018.

skins.description: Tasked with charting the heavens, Lulu's whimsical splashes of magic dot the sky with newborn stars. She keeps meticulous records of their names, mourning each of them when they finally pass.

skins.name: Pajama Guardian Lulu
skins.description: Fuzzy onesies! Paper fortune tellers! Cuddly, incoming! Lulu's so ready for this slumber party. Even Pix is excited, and getting into the spirit of things. Star Guardians are destined to protect the universeâ€”but that doesn't mean they can't have a little fun along the way!

skins.name: Space Groove Lulu

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2021.
This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2021 Space Groove event.

skins.description: Hailing from Boogie Wonderland, a planet of Pure Groove, Lulu is uniquely attuned to the resonance of cosmic disco energy. Using her staff to conjure visions of freedom and abandon to the beat of the music, she can get even the most left-footed creatures in the galaxy tapping along.

skins.name: Prestige Space Groove Lulu
skins.description: Fresh off a visit from the Three Party Goddesses in the center of the galaxy, Lulu's more in tune with the Groove than ever. Her visions are even more potent, her beats are even more irresistible, and no one knows where Lulu's going to pop up next.

skins.name: Monster Tamer Lulu

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2022.

skins.description: Though she's new to the scene, Lulu exemplifies what it means to be a Tamer. She's studied the CORE (Compact Object for Relay and Engagement) manual front to back. She's even used it in the field a few times! Her latest discovery: Zap'Maw, a creature as dangerous as it is adorable.

skins.name: Cafe Cuties Lulu

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2023.

skins.description: Sweet tooths are always satisfied when Lulu and her helpful sous-chef Pix are crafting the desserts! Just one whiff of their pastry magic concoctions is enough to enchant even the most unruly customers. Some say their treats are so captivating that they even have reality altering effectsâ€¦

passive.name: Pix, Faerie Companion
passive.description: Pix fires magical bolts of energy whenever the champion he's following attacks another enemy unit. These bolts are homing, but can be intercepted by other units.

spells.name: Glitterlance
spells.description: Pix and Lulu each fire a bolt of magical energy that damages and heavily slows all enemies it hits.
spells.dynamicDescription:
Lulu and Pix each fire a piercing bolt dealing @TotalDamage@ magic damage and Slowing by @Effect2Amount*-100@%, decaying over @Effect3Amount@ seconds.

Enemies take @BonusMissileDamage@ magic damage from additional bolts.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Whimsy
spells.description: If cast on an ally, grants them Attack Speed and Move Speed for a short time. If cast on an enemy, turns them into an adorable critter that can't attack or cast spells.
spells.dynamicDescription:
When used on an ally, Lulu grants @TotalMS@ Move Speed and @Effect7Amount*100@% Attack Speed for @Effect5Amount@ seconds.

When used on an enemy, Lulu Polymorphs them for @Effect3Amount@ seconds.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Help, Pix!
spells.description: If cast on an ally, commands Pix to jump to an ally and shield them. He then follows them and aids their attacks. If cast on an enemy, commands Pix to jump to an enemy and damage them. He then follows them and grants you vision of that enemy.
spells.dynamicDescription:
When used on an ally, Pix jumps to them and grants Pix, Faerie Companion for @Effect1Amount@ seconds. If the ally is a champion, Pix also grants @TotalShield@ Shield for @Effect7Amount@ seconds.

When used on an enemy champion, Pix hampers them, dealing @TotalDamage@ magic damage and granting True Sight of them for @Effect6Amount@ seconds.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Wild Growth
spells.description: Lulu enlarges an ally, knocking nearby enemies into the air and granting the ally a large amount of bonus health. For the next few seconds, that ally gains an aura that slows nearby enemies.
spells.dynamicDescription: Lulu enlarges an ally, <status>Knocking Up</status> surrounding enemies for @KnockbackDuration@ seconds. The enlarged ally gains <healing>@TotalBonusHealth@ max Health</healing> and <status>Slows</status> surrounding enemies by @SlowPercent@% for @BuffDuration@ seconds.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@
